data.meta_description: Download this stock image: THE OUTWARD URGE - A Science Fiction Novel by John Wyndham (written in collaboration with Lucas Parkes as technical adviser). Cover of 1962 Penguin edition. Note that John Wyndham and Lucas Parkes were the same person and just two of the variants that he used of his full name which was John Wyndham Parkes Lucas Beynon Harris. - RGFHM4 from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
data.text:
This image could have imperfections as itâ€™s either historical or reportage.

John Wyndham Parkes Lucas Beynon Harris (1903-1969) was a writer of science fiction who wrote under a number of different variants of his name. He wrote as John Beynon Harris, John Beynon, Lucas Parkes and John Wyndham. Before the war he had written under his pen names short stories for serialisation in American magazines but it was after the war than he changed his writing style and his pen name to John Wyndham. The Day of the Triffids was published in 1951 and became an immediate success. Further novels and short stories followed during his lifetime with some published posthumously.
